summary: THE VEHICLES HEAD GASKET CRACKED WHICH RESULTED IN AN OIL LEAK.   THE DEALER WAS NOTIFIED.  *NLM       THE VEHICLES HEAD GASKET CRACKED WHICH RESULTED IN AN OIL LEAK.   THE DEALER WAS NOTIFIED. OIL LEAK STARTED BEFORE AUG 2002 BUT OTHER COMPONENTS WERE DIAGNOSED AS PROBLEM.  ULTIMATELY, THE MECHANIC CHECKED THE HEAD GASKET AND FOUND THE ROOT OF THE PROBLEM.  I HAD THE PART REPLACED AT MY OWN EXPENSE TO HAVE THE CAR REPAIRED.  *MR
